original_text: For Christ also suffered once for sins, the righteous for the unrighteous, to bring you to God. He was put to death in the body but made alive in the Spirit.
korean_text: 그리스도께서도 단번에 죄를 위하여 죽으사 의인으로서 불의한 자를 대신하셨으니 이는 우리를 하나님 앞으로 인도하려 하심이라 육체로는 죽임을 당하시고 영으로는 살리심을 받으셨으니

sentences.original_text: For Christ also suffered once for sins,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도께서도 죄를 위해 단번에 고난 받으셨으니

sentences.original_text: He was put to death in the body,
but made alive in the Spirit.
